title: La Palma volcano: Drone footage shows "miracle house" spared by lava
content:
1. La Palma volcano: Drone footage shows "miracle house" spared by lava  Global News
  2. Canary Islands ‘miracle home’ stands alone against volcano’s lava flow  The Guardian
  3. Volcanic vent on Canary Islands of La Palma continues to spew hell, major contaminant threat  NEWS9 live
  4. 'Miracle Home' in Path of Lava Flow Survives  Newser
  5. Lava, smoke and ash cover Spain's La Palma  Reuters

localize.title: ラ・パルマの火山。ドローン映像で見る、溶岩を免れた「奇跡の家」。
